backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist covering branding, URL validation, and legacy slug checks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style layer defining themed color variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with metadata, canonical URL, and root script mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that loads ValentinePrompt and triggers metadata sync and slug guard.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadedIndicat: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/CopyShareLinkCon: Share-link button component that copies the public site URL with fallback UI on failure.
Primary interactive prompt with evasive 'No' button, success screen, and share control.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding strings such as title, description, and success message.
frontend/src/config/publicSiteUrl.ts: Defines the canonical public share URL with validation and retrieval helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH theme variables, romantic color utilities, and global light/dark styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, loading App and global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/appMetadata.ts: Updates document title, canonical link, and Open Graph URL based on branding and configured public URL.
frontend/src/utils/legacySlugGuard.ts: Checks for the legacy 'mahek' slug in PUBLIC_SITE_URL and runtime metadata, logging or throwing errors in dev.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature definitions related to fixing legacy 'mahek' URL handling.
